entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Freezing rain and a few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
